values.name: Text
values.value:
Hello dear friend. I have awaited you here for a long time.
I see you brought {{lux_amount}} of your precious lux with you. Have a look around, you might find something valuable in return.

values.name: Text
values.value:
Ha, thats all I can offer for now.
Choose wisly how you want to spend your {{lux_amount}} Lux.

values.name: Text
values.value: It was nice to do buisiness with you.
